content: Do you know any jokes about teachers and trains?

I've got one for you! Why don't teachers like trains? Because they always seem to be on the "track" of trouble! HA! Just kidding, trains are great, and so are teachers. They both help us reach our destinations, just in different ways. The teacher guides us in learning, and the train takes us from one place to another. So, in a way, they're both on the right track!
